message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product! I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you to get your hands on this valuable item. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1200000. I believe this is a fair price considering its worth to you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1050000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.
